Strings for IntroSlider<--> Home Screen NEXT SKIP Go HomePage Welcome to FoodZamo! Enjoy the delicious food items from your favourite restaurants! Home Delivery through APP Favourite food items at your door!. Order now through App. Cashbacks on Table Bills Get CASHBACK OF MINIMUM 10% on each of your table bill at every restaurant Promo Codes Get promocodes for Free Movie Tickets, Shopping, Hair Saloons, Coffee Shops and Many more! Daily Offers Get daily offers from your beloved Restuarants To see the welcome slider again Play Again FoodZamo is a startup founded by a group of students from ABV-IIITM, Gwalior. Our main aim is to provide best quality food from your favourite restaurants. By using FoodZamo app you can order food, get cashback on table bills, get promocodes for Movie Tickets, Shopping, Hair Saloons, Coffee Shops and on Many others. Get daily updates on Offers and Food Fests. So, Eat More! Earn More!
